Chinese Cultural Awareness & Etiquette Briefing Cross-Cultural Communications, Building and Strengthening Relationships, Fung-Shui and the concept of Ke Qi
A company’s success overseas oftentimes hinges on its ability to understand and appreciate cultural values.
Dealing with investors, government officials, or potential business partners in China requires a unique approach with subtle nuances.
John Diep, Asia & Pacific Director of Enterprise Florida, has first-hand knowledge of the relationship-building process in China and will be sharing his insights during this dynamic presentation.
Date, Time and Location: Monday, September 28, 2015 JAX Chamber 3 Independent Drive Jacksonville, FL 32202 8:00 – 10:00 AM
Cost: $10.00
Light refreshments will be provided
Representatives from area exporters and JAXPORT will also be on hand to share their perspective on doing business in China.
For more information contact: Larry Bernaski lbernaski@eflorida.com 904.359.9350
The JAXUSA Partnership, the Small Business Development Center at the University of North Florida, JAXPORT, the U.S. Commercial Service, the JAX Chamber and NAI Hallmark Partners
